_sText:
**** BHOP_TOGETHER - BY SLASHER ****


BEFORE YOU TAKE ANY LOOK AT THE SCREENSHOTS YOU SHOULD WATCH THE VIDEO! 
Why? The Screenshots don't show what the map ment to be. A speed up, non designed linear bunnyhop map. Can't imagine what this is? Just watch it naow, here:


<object width="560" height="340"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/5FEJwuvoq4g?fs=1&hl=de_DE"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/5FEJwuvoq4g?fs=1&hl=de_DE" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="560" height="340"></embed></object>

Now we cleared that. (You may sub my channel. :P)

The Map shouldn't be realased at all, it has a cold feeling, doesn't look nice, has no real spawn and end.
So, why i am releasing this?
I've never seen a linear bunnyhop map, this is something pretty original and fun to play on. May inspirate someone to create something that's not that boring.

If your Rating this map, don't act anything to the design!
The FPS Should be held pretty high and this was just made for fun.

So Far that's all -
enjoy. (:

**NOTICE: Your starting with standard weapons in a lil spawn. Noblock's required. Also this map ain't that easy, it's to long. So don't call this undoable! I don't know if it works on tick 200, since you need the right amount of speed to hit the Bhop thingies correctly.**
